title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.

title: Type
content: Set different types through type. The options are success, warning, info, and error. The default value is success.
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.

title: Large Size
content: Set different sizes through the size attribute. The options are nomal and large. The default value is nomal.
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.

title: Custom Title
content: When size is set to large, the title is displayed. You can set title or slot to customize the title. The default title is displayed according to the set type.
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.

title: Center text
content: You can use the center property to center the text.
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.

title: Customize the close button text
content: Customize the close button text through the close-text attribute.
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.

title: Customized warning icon
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.

title: Cannot be closed
content: You can set whether to display the close button through the closable attribute. If there is no close button, the warning box cannot be closed.
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.

title: Customized prompt content
content: You can customize the prompt content through the description attribute or slot.
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.

title: Customized Interaction
content: When size is large, set the default slot custom interaction operation.
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.

title: Close Event
content: close event, triggered when the warning dialog box is closed.
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.

title: Form submission result feedback
content: When size is set to large, the description attribute is used together with the default slot to render the feedback submission interface.
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.

title: Display icon
content: You can set the show-icon attribute to control whether to display the icon.
findIntroStr: Alert alarms, including warning, error, info, and success.
